Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small ZinbielAlgebra Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small ZinbielAlgebra AllSmallZinbielAlgebra is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic zinbielalgebra models from orders 2 to 3.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
